name: 21/22 Y1C - Team 3 - PHARAOH'S TRIBUTE
description:
Team 3 Platformer - Pharaoh's Tribute

You're an archeologist. Explore a pyramid, avoid traps, and collect the treasures. But watch out, because once you have the treasures, the pyramid will fill with lava. Make your way out before it's too late and your remains will join the pharaoh!

INPUTS:

Moving left or right:
Controller: The D-pad or Joystick
Keyboard: WASD

Jumping:
Controller: Bottom & Up Face Button
Keyboard: Space Bar

Sliding:
Controller: Triggers and the Left and Right Face Button
Keyboard: C

Open Menu:
Controller: Left and Right Special Buttons
Keyboard: Tab

Select from Menu:
Mouse or Controller

Known issues/bugs:

Feedback Form: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=m1gzCjYA6E-oKT7Qkmr4hgeFXbhbo4ZCuv-W5TQvxa9UOVQxT1RBRUFBNFpWVlc1Q04xT0ZOWDNPRy4u
